rukus.text: 26|105|Nufu no min mo, shito-tachi o shinjinakatta.
26|106|Kare-ra no doho no nufu ga, kare-ra ni itta toki o omoiokoshi nasai. `Anata gata wa,-nushi o osorenai nodesu ka.
26|107|Hontoni watashi wa, anata gata e no seijitsuna shitodesu.
26|108|Sore de arra o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai.
26|109|Watashi wa, sore ni taishi anata gata ni hoshu o motomemasen. Watashi e no hoshu wa, tada ban'yu no nushi kara (itadaku) dakedesu.
26|110|Dakara arra o osore, watashi ni shitagai nasai.'
26|111|Kare-ra wa itta. `Mottomo iyashi-sha-tachi ga anata ni shitagatte iru to iu no ni, watashi-tachi made anata o shinjiru nodesu ka.'
26|112|Kare (nufu) wa itta. `Kare-ra ga okonatte iru koto ni tsuite, watashi ga nani o shirimashou ka.
26|113|Kare-ra no seisan wa, tada watashi no omo ni zokusuru nodesu. Moshi anata gataga rikai surunaraba.
26|114|Mata watashi wa, shinko suru mono-tachi o oiharaimasen.
26|115|Watashi wa komeina hitori no keikoku-sha ni suginai nodesu.'
26|116|Kare-ra wa itta. `Anata ga tomenainara, nufu yo, kanarazu ishi-uchi ni sa rerudeshou.'
26|117|Kare wa (inotte) itta. `Omo yo, hontoni watashi no min wa watashi o uso-tsukidearu to moshimasu.
26|118|Sorede watashi to kare-ra no ma o, shikkari o sabaki kudasare, watashi to, watashi to issho no shinja-tachi o sukutte kudasai.'
26|119|Sokode ware wa kare to, kare to issho no mono-tachi o, mansai shita fune no naka ni sukutte yatta.
26|120|Sorekara ware wa ato ni nokotta-sha-tachi o obore saseta.
26|121|Hontoni kono nakaniha, hitotsu no shirushi ga aru. Daga kare-ra no oku wa shinjinai.
26|122|Hontoni anata no shu, kare wa iryoku narabinaku jihibukaku ara reru.
